name: Dude, Where's My Keys?
description:
You seem to have no memory of
where you last left your keys. 
It was a late night for you, 
staying up to make games.

Search high and low in this physics based scavenger hunt for your lost keys!

Controls:
Mouse = Look around
LMB = Poke
WASD = Move
E = Pick up keys / Get in car
Ctrl = Crouch
Space = Jump

Credits:
MetricZero - 3d Modeler
Zope - Programmer
tfx - Music (https://soundcloud.com/tfx-st)

This game was made in 48 hours for the Pizza Jam.
If you would like to see this game further developed, please consider leaving a comment and let us know. We would love to hear any ideas, suggestions, or feedback you might have!

Come join us in Discord: https://discord.gg/63XVDv5
